CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( Status, "New", "/resource/icon_case/Status_New.png", "Escalated", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Escalate.png", "Waiting for Investigation", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Waiting_for_Investigation.png", "Waiting for Response", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Waiting_Customer_Response.png", "Investigated", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Investigated.png", "Customer Response", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Customer_Response.png", "Resolved", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Resolved.png", "Acknowledge", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Acknowledge.png", "Duplicate", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Duplicate.png", "Closed", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Closed.png", "Re-Open", "/resource/icon_case/Status_Reopen.png", "/resource/icon_case/Status_New.png"),"",24,24)
CustomField.label: Indicator
